segments.text: It ’ s time to get up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You shouldn ’ t stay up so late watching TV . I told you we had to get an early start .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know , but that movie was just too good to leave . I guess I ’ ll just have to pay the price anti-sleepy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you want to eat breakfast here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . why don ’ t we describe and buy at the coffee shop next door ?
segments.speaker: S2
